about_the_game:
Using state-of-the-art, self-developed machine-learning techniques, SpellCaster provides an extremely fast and accurate sound command recognition system. Simply record your sound commands and use them as keyboard inputs. SpellCaster is easy-to-use and fully customizable. SpellCaster adds a whole new level of interaction to your favourite games.

Features:


  • Super Easy-To-Use:
    It takes only a couple of seconds to set up a command. You simply need to record your sound commands via microphone, your key commands via keyboard and connect them.

  • Extreme Speed:
    Incredibly fast 22 milliseconds needs SpellCaster to recognize a sound command in your microphone stream. (Tested on a quad-core CPU with 4 GHz)

  • Accuracy:
    In the heat of the battle your voice changes from calm to commanding and excited, SpellCaster is nevertheless able to recognize your sound commands properly.

  • Freedom In Choosing Sound Commands:
    The AI of SpellCaster does not know any words or languages. You can choose your sound commands freely.

  • Your Data Is Save:
    The recorded data is only used within SpellCaster. It is not used for any other purpose.

  • Customizable:
    You can record complex keyboard inputs and even combine multiple sound and key commands.

  • No Expensive Hardware Needed:
    Although SpellCaster works best with an external microphone or headset, any microphone will do the job.

  • Low Resource Consumption:
    Due to very low resource consumption you can use SpellCaster in every game.

  • Fully Automatic Recognition:
    After training the AI, SpellCaster continuously checks your microphone input for sound commands.
